commands: if [ -d /etc/letsencrypt/live/summit-api.codingeverest.com ]; then sudo sed -i 's|ssl_certificate /etc/letsencrypt/live/api.codingeverest.com/fullchain.pem|ssl_certificate /etc/letsencrypt/live/summit-api.codingeverest.com/fullchain.pem|g' /etc/nginx/conf.d/summit-api.conf; sudo sed -i 's|ssl_certificate_key /etc/letsencrypt/live/api.codingeverest.com/privkey.pem|ssl_certificate_key /etc/letsencrypt/live/summit-api.codingeverest.com/privkey.pem|g' /etc/nginx/conf.d/summit-api.conf; echo 'Updated to use summit-api certificate'; else echo 'Using api.codingeverest.com certificate (summit-api cert not ready yet)'; fi
